    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(WearableConnectionCallback callback)
      Attempts to open a bluetooth socket with the device and registers a persistent callback that will notify the caller of any changes in connection status.
      void disconnect(NoParameterCallback callback)
      Closes the bluetooth socket and unhooks the persistent connection callback registered upon connection.
      android.os.Handler getHandler() 
      FightClubConnection.State getState() 
      void onRecoveryModeEvent() 
      void reconnect(NoParameterCallback callback)
      Attempts to re-enqueue connection so in case it was broken at some point it would restart

      void setHandler(android.os.Handler handler)
